About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

A UX designer at Ubisoft and Institut Polytechnique de Paris graduate with background in Human-Computer Interaction, computer science and research. Acquired skills in:

  • UX design
  • UI design
  • UX research
  • Web development and design
  • Management & communication

Currently looking for a new adventure.
